director.name: 艾丽西亚·K. 哈里斯 Alicia K. Harris

introduction: Beyond Black Beauty is a multi-generational story that follows Jolie Dubois, a strong-willed and gifted equestrian whose Olympic dreams are stunted when her mother shockingly moves them from the wealthy stables of the Belgian elite to a family urban ranch in Baltimore. In this new world, Jolie forges a bond with a kindred spirit, Beauty, a statuesque black horse who has lost her faith in humankind, but together, they discover their own strength as they learn the value of home.
